name: OneStoreHub Pte Ltd
description: Developer of cloud-based point-of-sale software designed to help retailers to digitize their business. The company's software develops a cloud-based point-of-sale system that offers real-time reports, inventory management, and customer data collection that help to connect the long line of less sophisticated physical traders online, enabling users to digitize their finances and inventory management.
one_liner: Developer of cloud-based point-of-sale software designed to help retailers to digitize their business.
